transcription_info.text_preview: Line them up, that's a easy kill I'm a real ghetto boy, I build peasy steel I ain't touch the trigger, but I seen the drill Your career ain't promising, you probably need a will Seen a nigga with his ...

scene_selection.energy_arc: The song starts with a gritty and intense energy, builds through moments of tension and reflection, and peaks with a mix of bravado and caution before ending on a reflective note.

selected_scenes.title: Ghetto Steel
selected_scenes.lyrics_excerpt: Line them up, that's a easy kill I'm a real ghetto boy, I build peasy steel
selected_scenes.reasoning: Sets the tone with gritty imagery and introduces the protagonist's street-smart persona.

selected_scenes.title: Witness to Violence
selected_scenes.lyrics_excerpt: I ain't touch the trigger, but I seen the drill Your career ain't promising, you probably need a will Seen a nigga with his head gone and I can see him still
selected_scenes.reasoning: High-stakes moment showcasing the harsh realities of street life.

selected_scenes.title: Steering Wheel Horror
selected_scenes.lyrics_excerpt: I swear to God that nigga, she was stuck to the steering wheel Ten footers fit from five years ago
selected_scenes.reasoning: Graphic imagery that reinforces the consequences of street violence.

selected_scenes.title: Grit and Grind
selected_scenes.lyrics_excerpt: I'ma wear his skin I put that on my kids, I get in that gym, I can't never tell That's why I gotta watch how I move
selected_scenes.reasoning: Shows the protagonist's resilience and determination.

selected_scenes.title: Street Rules
selected_scenes.lyrics_excerpt: Move right, cause if I get some time, then I gotta do it Don't get out of free, jail curt, it's not Monopoly I'm down four racks and I ain't do shit but go out to eat
selected_scenes.reasoning: Highlights the rules and risks of street life.

selected_scenes.title: Scope and Dominate
selected_scenes.lyrics_excerpt: Scope on, he hit a nigga in his dome from down the street This shit so strong, I'm 23 or both, so why you lie to me? You ever got hit from a bitch and then you gotta
selected_scenes.reasoning: Intense action scene that underscores the protagonist's dominance.

selected_scenes.title: Flint's Reputation
selected_scenes.lyrics_excerpt: I heard she had the best pussy in Flint, you know I gotta see Of course I got cash with me, but I'm not with C
selected_scenes.reasoning: Adds a layer of local color and street culture.

selected_scenes.title: Weed and Wealth
selected_scenes.lyrics_excerpt: Cash with me, so we play the BPSUV Before I go back broke, I sell some weed
selected_scenes.reasoning: Shows the protagonist's hustle and resourcefulness.

selected_scenes.title: Club Danger
selected_scenes.lyrics_excerpt: It's been so long since I smelled the seed, like Where the fuck the real bud at? Don't get too close, we got a fucking Draco in the club, Jack
selected_scenes.reasoning: Highlights the ever-present danger in social settings.

selected_scenes.title: Showtime Hustle
selected_scenes.lyrics_excerpt: Buy a pint of Axe for 20 racks, then take the dub back I need 30 racks for the fucking show, and where the club at? Damn, you bad as fuck, where my hug at?
selected_scenes.reasoning: Shows the protagonist's hustle and determination to succeed.

selected_scenes.title: Pipe's Demand
selected_scenes.lyrics_excerpt: We still got the nigga Pipe, he want his gun back Do you wanna hear a fun fact?
selected_scenes.reasoning: Adds tension and a sense of unresolved conflict.

selected_scenes.title: M's and Bravado
selected_scenes.lyrics_excerpt: I really made some motherfucking M's and I ain't do number rap You ever had five M's at once? Okay, you didn't, so you won't understand why I don't give a fuck
selected_scenes.reasoning: Showcases the protagonist's success and confidence.

selected_scenes.title: Kitchen Chaos
selected_scenes.lyrics_excerpt: Money is not everything, J be ripping dubs They shot the crib up so bad, fucked the kitchen up Blew the kitchen up, you know the stove's gas
selected_scenes.reasoning: High-stakes action scene that underscores the risks of street life.

selected_scenes.title: Bank Success
selected_scenes.lyrics_excerpt: You better leave my white ends alone with your old ass You ain't want your car to get shot up, you shouldn't have rolled past I walked out the bank with a smile in a stow bag
selected_scenes.reasoning: Shows the protagonist's success and the rewards of his hustle.

selected_scenes.title: Dope and Deception
selected_scenes.lyrics_excerpt: I sent her to the bank on a plane, and she drove back I took the bitch's neck, she want her throat back Ironic how he never left the house, but bring the dope back
selected_scenes.reasoning: Highlights the protagonist's cunning and street smarts.

selected_scenes.title: Closed Casket
selected_scenes.lyrics_excerpt: When I catch up with them boys, they get in a closed casket Matter of fact, they need four caskets I think my white boy, he working with the feds, he just bought four baskets
selected_scenes.reasoning: Intense and dramatic scene that underscores the stakes of street life.

selected_scenes.title: Boss Moves
selected_scenes.lyrics_excerpt: He ain't never bought more than a gram Take the trash out with a pole in your hand I'm a real fucking boss, I work chrome in jail
selected_scenes.reasoning: Showcases the protagonist's dominance and leadership.

selected_scenes.title: Reflection and Resilience
selected_scenes.lyrics_excerpt: You probably should catch one by yourself, as niggas gonna tell I can't put my life in another nigga's hands I ran my shit up, this is not another nigga Benz
selected_scenes.reasoning: Reflective moment that underscores the protagonist's resilience and independence.

scene_selection.reasoning_summary: The selected scenes were chosen to maximize visual storytelling, emotional impact, and narrative importance. The scenes cover the entire song timeline without gaps, ensuring complete coverage. The energy arc of the song is maintained, starting with gritty intensity, building through tension and reflection, and ending with a mix of bravado and caution. The scenes vary in mood and energy, providing a dynamic and cinematic experience that aligns with the song's themes of street life, survival, and ambition.

visual_prompts.image_prompt: A gritty urban alley at dusk, neon signs flickering, a young man in a hoodie stands confidently with a steel pipe in hand, shadows casting dramatic angles. The alley is littered with debris, and the light from a distant streetlamp creates a cinematic glow. The atmosphere is tense and raw.
visual_prompts.style_notes: High contrast lighting, cinematic framing, urban decay aesthetic
visual_prompts.negative_prompt: Avoid bright colors, overly clean environments, unrealistic poses

visual_prompts.image_prompt: A dimly lit street corner, rain-slicked pavement reflecting neon lights. A young man stands frozen, witnessing a violent scene unfold—a shadowy figure with a gun, another collapsing. The camera focuses on the witness's horrified expression, his face half-lit by a flickering streetlight.
visual_prompts.style_notes: Cinematic noir lighting, high drama, emotional intensity
visual_prompts.negative_prompt: Avoid static poses, overly bright lighting, lack of tension
visual_prompts.shot_type: Close-up with shallow depth of field
visual_prompts.color_palette: Dark greens, blues, and blacks with neon highlights

visual_prompts.image_prompt: A wrecked car interior, blood splattered on the steering wheel, a lifeless hand gripping it. The camera angle is tight, focusing on the gruesome detail. The dashboard lights cast an eerie glow, and rain streaks the shattered windshield.
visual_prompts.negative_prompt: Avoid clean environments, unrealistic gore, bright lighting
visual_prompts.color_palette: Deep reds, blacks, and sickly greens

visual_prompts.image_prompt: A dimly lit gym, sweat glistening on a muscular figure as he lifts weights. The camera captures his determined expression, shadows accentuating his physique. The background is blurred, with faint graffiti on the walls.
visual_prompts.style_notes: High contrast, gritty realism, focus on physicality
visual_prompts.negative_prompt: Avoid overly bright lighting, sterile environments, lack of intensity

visual_prompts.image_prompt: A courtroom hallway, the protagonist walking in slow motion, flanked by cops. The walls are lined with peeling paint, and the fluorescent lights cast a cold glow. His expression is stoic, hands cuffed, but his eyes burn with defiance.
visual_prompts.negative_prompt: Avoid overly clean settings, lack of tension, bright colors
visual_prompts.color_palette: Cool grays, blues, and muted greens

visual_prompts.image_prompt: A rooftop at dawn, a sniper scope POV looking down at a distant figure. The crosshairs are visible, the wind ruffling the shooter's jacket. The city skyline is hazy in the background, the sun barely rising.
visual_prompts.negative_prompt: Avoid static compositions, lack of focus, overly bright lighting
visual_prompts.color_palette: Dawn oranges, grays, and deep blues

visual_prompts.image_prompt: A dimly lit bedroom, a woman lounging on a messy bed, counting cash. The protagonist stands in the doorway, shadows masking half his face. The air is thick with tension and desire.
visual_prompts.style_notes: Noir-inspired, sensual but gritty, high contrast
visual_prompts.negative_prompt: Avoid overly bright lighting, sterile environments, lack of mood

visual_prompts.image_prompt: A backroom deal, stacks of cash and bags of weed on a table. The protagonist leans back in a chair, smoke curling from his lips. The lighting is low, with a single bulb swinging overhead.
visual_prompts.style_notes: Gritty realism, high stakes, atmospheric lighting
visual_prompts.negative_prompt: Avoid overly bright lighting, lack of tension, unrealistic details
visual_prompts.shot_type: Wide shot with shallow depth of field

visual_prompts.image_prompt: A packed nightclub, strobe lights flashing, the crowd moving in slow motion. The protagonist stands at the VIP section, a Draco barely visible under his jacket. The atmosphere is electric but dangerous.
visual_prompts.style_notes: Slow-motion chaos, high energy, cinematic club lighting
visual_prompts.negative_prompt: Avoid static poses, lack of energy, overly bright lighting

visual_prompts.image_prompt: A backstage area, the protagonist counting stacks of cash, a bodyguard looming behind him. A beautiful woman leans against the wall, watching. The lighting is moody, with red accents.
visual_prompts.style_notes: Cinematic framing, high stakes, luxurious but gritty
visual_prompts.negative_prompt: Avoid sterile environments, lack of tension, unrealistic wealth

visual_prompts.image_prompt: A shadowy figure in a trench coat holding a gun, standing in an abandoned warehouse. The protagonist tosses him a duffel bag. The only light comes from a distant exit sign, casting long shadows.
visual_prompts.negative_prompt: Avoid bright lighting, lack of mystery, unrealistic poses

visual_prompts.image_prompt: A luxury penthouse, the protagonist lounging on a couch, stacks of cash scattered around him. The city skyline glows through floor-to-ceiling windows. His expression is smug, victorious.
visual_prompts.style_notes: Opulent but gritty, high contrast, cinematic framing
visual_prompts.negative_prompt: Avoid overly bright lighting, sterile environments, lack of edge

visual_prompts.image_prompt: A destroyed kitchen, bullet holes in the walls, shattered dishes everywhere. The protagonist stands amid the chaos, a gun in hand, smoke still lingering. The lighting is harsh, from a single hanging bulb.
visual_prompts.negative_prompt: Avoid clean environments, lack of tension, unrealistic damage

visual_prompts.image_prompt: A bank lobby, the protagonist walking out with a duffel bag, a smirk on his face. Security guards lie unconscious behind him. The marble floors reflect the cold fluorescent lights.
visual_prompts.style_notes: Cinematic heist aesthetic, cool tones, high tension
visual_prompts.negative_prompt: Avoid warm lighting, lack of drama, unrealistic poses

visual_prompts.image_prompt: An airport parking lot at night, a woman stepping out of a car with a suitcase full of cash. The protagonist watches from a distance, his face half-lit by a streetlamp. The atmosphere is tense, deceptive.
visual_prompts.negative_prompt: Avoid bright lighting, lack of mystery, static compositions
visual_prompts.shot_type: Medium shot with shallow depth of field

visual_prompts.image_prompt: A funeral home, four caskets lined up, the protagonist standing over them with a cold expression. The lighting is somber, with stained glass windows casting colored shadows.
visual_prompts.style_notes: Gothic undertones, high drama, cinematic composition
visual_prompts.negative_prompt: Avoid bright lighting, lack of gravity, unrealistic details

visual_prompts.image_prompt: A prison yard, the protagonist lifting weights, his muscles straining under the harsh sunlight. Other inmates watch from a distance. The barbed wire fences cast sharp shadows.
visual_prompts.style_notes: Gritty realism, high contrast, focus on physicality
visual_prompts.negative_prompt: Avoid overly bright lighting, lack of tension, sterile environments

visual_prompts.image_prompt: A quiet street at dawn, the protagonist walking alone, his reflection in a puddle. The city is waking up, but he looks exhausted, haunted. The lighting is soft but cold.
visual_prompts.negative_prompt: Avoid overly bright lighting, lack of emotion, static compositions
visual_prompts.color_palette: Cool blues, grays, and muted oranges

visual_prompts.style_consistency: The music video should maintain a gritty, cinematic aesthetic with high contrast lighting, urban decay, and emotional intensity. Each scene should feel like a frame from a noir film, with a focus on shadows, dramatic angles, and raw authenticity. The color palette leans toward muted, dark tones with occasional neon highlights to emphasize key moments.
visual_prompts.generation_notes: Ensure all images have a consistent visual language—avoid bright, saturated colors unless for specific dramatic effect. Focus on realism with a cinematic edge, and prioritize emotional resonance over flashy visuals. Use shallow depth of field and motion blur to enhance the cinematic feel.
